entries: In the chaotic rush of battle, you learned to adapt to rapidly changing conditions as you administered to battle casualties.
You patched up soldiers, guards, or other combatants, and learned a fair amount about the logistics of war.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Medicine} skill and the {@skill Lore||Warfare Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Battle Medicine} skill feat.
